snippet.title: #thealmostgone | The Almost Gone - Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist The Almost Gone on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1115780/The_Almost_Gone/
Subscribe to our newsletter for other platforms at https://www.thealmostgone.com

The Almost Gone is a mystery point-and-click adventure where a young girl’s spirit looks for a way-out in a magical afterlife.

See more at https://www.thealmostgone.com/
